creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: teapot, globular, blue on white, with floral decoration one side and garden scene on the other; dentate design on shoulder; the letter 'G' appears on the bottom; this symbol was found on much porcelain exported to Europe during the XVIII century
title: Teapot
